title: Waterfall Sikvaruli
about: The Waterfall Sikvaruli (waterfall of love) is located in Racha, in the municipality of Ambrolauri, near the entrance of Ambrolauri on Gurgenia street, 500 meters from sea level. The waterfall flows on the mossy rocky massive and creates marvelous sight. It is especially distinguished for the beautiful heart-shaped entry cave. The name itself comes from this as well. The Waterfall of Love is one of the most popular remarkable places in Racha and attracts the attention of countless tourists during the year.
